text: Hagi ana higeno mago'a vahe'mo'za vu'za Asiria kini nera amanage hu'za ome asami'naze, Kagrama zamavarenka Sameria kumatmimpima ome zamante'nana, vahe'mo'za ana mopafima nemania Anumzamofo kasegea ontahi'naze. E'ina hu'negu ana mopafi Anumzamo'a laioni huzamantege'za eza ana vahera eme zamahe fri'naze.
